requirements.summary: Redeploy application to production preserving all backend data including articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom, resources, cybercrime articles, home page links, and mission content
acceptanceCriteria: All existing articles remain accessible after deployment
All X posts and their images are preserved
All spotlight entries with their content and images remain intact
All cybercrime articles with thumbnails are preserved
All home page links with thumbnails remain functional
Mission content including title, description, and images is preserved
No data loss occurs during the deployment process

file_operations.description: Verify all tab navigation and content sections remain wired correctly for Mission/Overview with HomePageLinks, Progress, XPosts, Spotlight, Wisdom, Resources, Cybercrime, and Additional Resources tabs
Verify article fetching, display, and CRUD operations work correctly post-deployment using getAllArticles backend capability
Verify X post fetching and image display work correctly post-deployment using getAllXPosts backend capability with ExternalBlob images
Verify spotlight entries with content and optional images are fetched and displayed correctly using getAllSpotlights backend capability
Verify wisdom entries are fetched and displayed correctly using getAllWisdom backend capability
Verify trusted resources are fetched and displayed correctly using getAllResources backend capability
Verify cybercrime articles with thumbnails are fetched and displayed correctly using getAllCybercrimeArticles backend capability
Verify home page links with thumbnails are fetched and displayed correctly using getAllHomePageLinks backend capability with ExternalBlob thumbnails
Verify mission content including title, description, and images array is fetched and displayed correctly using getMissionContent backend capability with ExternalBlob images
Verify all React Query hooks for fetching and mutating data are correctly configured to work with the backend interface after deployment

requirements.summary: Verify Additional Resources tab, delete buttons across all content types, and home page links with thumbnails remain functional after redeployment
acceptanceCriteria: Additional Resources tab is accessible in the navigation
Delete buttons appear on all content types (articles, X posts, spotlights, wisdom, resources, cybercrime articles, home page links)
Home page links section displays with thumbnails
All CRUD operations work as expected post-deployment

file_operations.description: Verify Additional Resources menu item is present and functional in the navigation dropdown
Verify Additional Resources component renders correctly when tab is selected
Verify Additional Resources tab state and rendering logic is correctly wired in the main App component
Verify delete button and confirmation dialog functionality for articles using deleteArticle backend capability
Verify delete button and confirmation dialog functionality for X posts using deleteXPost backend capability
Verify delete button and confirmation dialog functionality for spotlight entries using deleteSpotlight backend capability
Verify delete button and confirmation dialog functionality for wisdom entries using deleteWisdom backend capability
Verify delete button and confirmation dialog functionality for resources using deleteResource backend capability
Verify delete button and confirmation dialog functionality for cybercrime articles using deleteCybercrimeArticle backend capability
Verify delete button and confirmation dialog functionality for home page links using deleteHomePageLink backend capability, and verify thumbnail display using ExternalBlob
Verify add article dialog with thumbnail upload works correctly using addArticle backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify edit article dialog with thumbnail update works correctly using updateArticle backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify add X post dialog with image upload works correctly using addXPost backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify edit X post dialog with image update works correctly using updateXPost backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify add spotlight dialog with optional image upload works correctly using addSpotlight backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify edit spotlight dialog with optional image update works correctly using updateSpotlight backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify add wisdom dialog works correctly using addWisdom backend capability
Verify edit wisdom dialog works correctly using updateWisdom backend capability
Verify add resource dialog works correctly using addResource backend capability
Verify edit resource dialog works correctly using updateResource backend capability
Verify add cybercrime article dialog with thumbnail upload works correctly using addCybercrimeArticle backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify edit cybercrime article dialog with thumbnail update works correctly using updateCybercrimeArticle backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify add home page link dialog with thumbnail upload works correctly using addHomePageLink backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify edit home page link dialog with thumbnail update works correctly using updateHomePageLink backend capability with ExternalBlob
Verify edit mission dialog with multiple image uploads works correctly using updateMissionContent backend capability with ExternalBlob array
